title: Sound On: Powell Testimony, Budget Details
itunes:title: Sound On: Powell Testimony, Budget Details
description:
Guest hosts Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino spoke to Yasha Mounk, Associate Professor at Johns Hopkins School of Advanced International Studies, and Senior Fellow at Council on Foreign Relations. Also, Bloomberg's Joe Weisenthal spoke with Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo about the Biden administration's plans to expand the U.S. post-pandemic economy by investing in infrastructure, and investing in programs like the child tax credit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
